Posts.Content: May 11, 2012 03:19PM Dizzy215 wrote: Purple32: I had a Lx 4 weeks ago and have made a full recovery. I put aloe vera on the scar...Trader Joes does a 99% pure version...and that has helped cool it and with the healing process.  I wonder if the pulling sensation could be some axillary cording?  I felt this about 2 weeks after my op and it is getting better with lots of stretching.
